description: This file implements a React component that manages OAuth callback redirection, parsing URL parameters for provider, status, and message, and navigating the user accordingly within a Next.js application.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main exported React component that renders a Suspense boundary and inner component.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Inner component that performs the URL parameter parsing and navigation logic.
